ItemType.name: Síva-5M reactor
ItemType.description: This fuel efficient reactor has a peak power output of 5MW and accepts tech level 1 fuel. It can be freely modified with the included Cabbage Corp Toolset to output 8MW at the cost of decreased fuel efficiency.

ItemType.description: This fuel efficient reactor has a peak power output of 10MW and accepts fuel of tech level 1-2. It can be freely modified with the included Cabbage Corp Toolset to output 15MW at the cost of decreased fuel efficiency.
